name: mounter 2
short_description:
Mounter2 mounts several iso images with a graphical interface to save you from having to type commands out to mount unmount.  With mounter2 its as easy as select a file and a quick mouse click. All without the need for a root password.

you will need gtk and also udevil.  

if your distro does not provide udevil a link to the udevil homepage is provided in the readme.

cheers all

-- soon to come drag and drop functionality --

-- 
there is also a deb package and readme
included in the mounter2debian file
if you are on a debian based distro
including ubuntu and have trouble 
compiling sources please try this 
package
--
summary: gtk app to mount iso files instead of having to use the command line
